movie.title: War Dogs
movie.plot: Based on the true story of two young men, David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli, who won a $300 million contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 nominations.

events.title: Efraim Diveroli finds "The Afghan deal" online
AEY win the Afghan deal contract
Efraim Diveroli is sentenced to four years in prison
